content:
IDebugConvert Interface

In this Article

Defines a set of utility methods that convert data from one type to another. Includes methods that convert values to String objects so that they can be displayed by the debugger.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisible(true)]
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.Guid("AA51516D-C0F2-49fe-9D38-61D20456904C")]
public interface IDebugConvert

Methods summary

BooleanToString(Boolean)

When implemented in a class, converts the specified Boolean value to a String.
ByteToString(Byte,Int32)

When implemented in a class, converts the specified Byte value to a String.
DoubleToDateString(Double)

When implemented in a class, creates a string representation of the specified Double. The string representation contains the day of the week, the month, the date, the time, the time zone, and the year.
DoubleToString(Double)

When implemented in a class, converts the specified Double value to a String.
GetErrorMessageForHR(Int32,IJSVsaEngine)

When implemented in a class, gets an error message that is created from the specified stem.Exception.HResult* and the CultureInfo of the specified IJSVsaEngine.
GetManagedCharObject(UInt16)

When implemented in a class, creates a managed object that has the specified primitive Char value.
GetManagedInt64Object(Int64)

When implemented in a class, creates a managed object that has the specified primitive Int64 value.
GetManagedObject(Object)

When implemented in a class, creates a managed object that has the specified primitive value.
GetManagedUInt64Object(UInt64)

When implemented in a class, creates a managed object that has the specified primitive UInt64 value.
Int16ToString(Int16,Int32)

When implemented in a class, converts the specified Int16 value to a String.
Int32ToString(Int32,Int32)

When implemented in a class, converts the specified Int32 value to a String.
Int64ToString(Int64,Int32)

When implemented in a class, converts the specified Int64 value to a String.
RegexpToString(String,Boolean,Boolean,Boolean)

When implemented in a class, converts the specified regular expression information to a String.
SByteToString(SByte,Int32)

When implemented in a class, converts the specified SByte value to a String.
SingleToString(Single)

When implemented in a class, converts the specified Single value to a String.
StringToPrintable(String)

When implemented in a class, converts the specified String to a String that contains escape characters for non-printable characters.
ToPrimitive(Object,TypeCode,Boolean)

When implemented in a class, converts the specified value to the specified TypeCode, optionally allowing data loss.
UInt16ToString(UInt16,Int32)

When implemented in a class, converts the specified UInt16 value to a String.
UInt32ToString(UInt32,Int32)

When implemented in a class, converts the specified UInt32 value to a String.
UInt64ToString(UInt64,Int32)

When implemented in a class, converts the specified UInt64 value to a String.

Methods

  • BooleanToString(Boolean)

    When implemented in a class, converts the specified Boolean value to a String.

    public string BooleanToString (bool value);

    Parameters

    • value
      Boolean

      The value to convert.

    Returns

    • String

      The literal string "true" or the literal string "false".

  • ByteToString(Byte,Int32)

    When implemented in a class, converts the specified Byte value to a String.

    public string ByteToString (byte value, int radix);

    Parameters

    • value
      Byte

      The value to convert.

    • radix
      Int32

      The base of the return value. The base must be 2, 8, 10, or 16.

    Returns

    • String

      The string representation of value in base radix.

  • DoubleToDateString(Double)

    When implemented in a class, creates a string representation of the specified Double. The string representation contains the day of the week, the month, the date, the time, the time zone, and the year.

    public string DoubleToDateString (double value);

    Parameters

    • value
      Double

      The value to convert.

    Returns

    • String

      The string representation of value.

  • DoubleToString(Double)

    When implemented in a class, converts the specified Double value to a String.

    public string DoubleToString (double value);

    Parameters

    • value
      Double

      The value to convert.

    Returns

    • String

      The string representation of value.

  • GetErrorMessageForHR(Int32,IJSVsaEngine)

    When implemented in a class, gets an error message that is created from the specified stem.Exception.HResult* and the CultureInfo of the specified IJSVsaEngine.

    public string GetErrorMessageForHR (int hr, Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaEngine engine);

    Parameters

    • hr
      Int32

      The HRESULT error code.

    • engine
      IJSVsaEngine

      A reference to the scripting engine.

    Returns

    • String

      A localized string that contains information about the error.

  • GetManagedCharObject(UInt16)

    When implemented in a class, creates a managed object that has the specified primitive Char value.

    public object GetManagedCharObject (ushort i);

    Parameters

    • i
      UInt16

      The value to convert.

    Returns

    • Object

      i converted to a Char and then an Object.

  • GetManagedInt64Object(Int64)

    When implemented in a class, creates a managed object that has the specified primitive Int64 value.

    public object GetManagedInt64Object (long i);

    Parameters

    • i
      Int64

      The value to convert.

    Returns

    • Object

      i converted to an Object.

  • GetManagedObject(Object)

    When implemented in a class, creates a managed object that has the specified primitive value.

    public object GetManagedObject (object value);

    Parameters

    • value
      Object

      The value to convert.

    Returns

    • Object

      value converted to a managed Object.

  • GetManagedUInt64Object(UInt64)

    When implemented in a class, creates a managed object that has the specified primitive UInt64 value.

    public object GetManagedUInt64Object (ulong i);

    Parameters

    • i
      UInt64

      The value to convert.

    Returns

    • Object

      i converted to an Object.

  • Int16ToString(Int16,Int32)

    When implemented in a class, converts the specified Int16 value to a String.

    public string Int16ToString (short value, int radix);

    Parameters

    • value
      Int16

      The value to convert.

    • radix
      Int32

      The base of the return value. The base must be 2, 8, 10, or 16.

    Returns

    • String

      The string representation of value in base radix.

  • Int32ToString(Int32,Int32)

    When implemented in a class, converts the specified Int32 value to a String.

    public string Int32ToString (int value, int radix);

    Parameters

    • value
      Int32

      The value to convert.

    • radix
      Int32

      The base of the return value. The base must be 2, 8, 10, or 16.

    Returns

    • String

      The string representation of value in base radix.

  • Int64ToString(Int64,Int32)

    When implemented in a class, converts the specified Int64 value to a String.

    public string Int64ToString (long value, int radix);

    Parameters

    • value
      Int64

      The value to convert.

    • radix
      Int32

      The base of the return value. The base must be 2, 8, 10, or 16.

    Returns

    • String

      The string representation of value in base radix.

  • RegexpToString(String,Boolean,Boolean,Boolean)

    When implemented in a class, converts the specified regular expression information to a String.

    public string RegexpToString (string source, bool ignoreCase, bool global, bool multiline);

    Parameters

    • source
      String

      The regular expression pattern to match.

    • ignoreCase
      Boolean

      true to use case-insensitive matching; otherwise, false.

    • global
      Boolean

      true to use a global match; otherwise, false.

    • multiline
      Boolean

      true to use a multiline match; otherwise, false.

    Returns

    • String

      The string representation of the regular expression information.

  • SByteToString(SByte,Int32)

    When implemented in a class, converts the specified SByte value to a String.

    public string SByteToString (sbyte value, int radix);

    Parameters

    • value
      SByte

      The value to convert.

    • radix
      Int32

      The base of the return value. The base must be 2, 8, 10, or 16.

    Returns

    • String

      The string representation of value in base radix.

  • SingleToString(Single)

    When implemented in a class, converts the specified Single value to a String.

    public string SingleToString (float value);

    Parameters

    • value
      Single

      The value to convert.

    Returns

    • String

      The string representation of value.

  • StringToPrintable(String)

    When implemented in a class, converts the specified String to a String that contains escape characters for non-printable characters.

    public string StringToPrintable (string source);

    Parameters

    • source
      String

      The value to convert.

    Returns

    • String

      The string representation of source that contains escape characters.

  • ToPrimitive(Object,TypeCode,Boolean)

    When implemented in a class, converts the specified value to the specified TypeCode, optionally allowing data loss.

    public object ToPrimitive (object value, TypeCode typeCode, bool truncationPermitted);

    Parameters

    • value
      Object

      The value to convert to a new type.

    • typeCode
      TypeCode

      The type to convert value to.

    • truncationPermitted
      Boolean

      true to allow data loss; otherwise, false.

    Returns

    • Object

      value converted to the typeCode type.

  • UInt16ToString(UInt16,Int32)

    When implemented in a class, converts the specified UInt16 value to a String.

    public string UInt16ToString (ushort value, int radix);

    Parameters

    • value
      UInt16

      The value to convert.

    • radix
      Int32

      The base of the return value. The base must be 2, 8, 10, or 16.

    Returns

    • String

      The string representation of value in base radix.

  • UInt32ToString(UInt32,Int32)

    When implemented in a class, converts the specified UInt32 value to a String.

    public string UInt32ToString (uint value, int radix);

    Parameters

    • value
      UInt32

      The value to convert.

    • radix
      Int32

      The base of the return value. The base must be 2, 8, 10, or 16.

    Returns

    • String

      The string representation of value in base radix.

  • UInt64ToString(UInt64,Int32)

    When implemented in a class, converts the specified UInt64 value to a String.

    public string UInt64ToString (ulong value, int radix);

    Parameters

    • value
      UInt64

      The value to convert.

    • radix
      Int32

      The base of the return value. The base must be 2, 8, 10, or 16.

    Returns

    • String

      The string representation of value in base radix.
